About us

Cygnet Infotech, a technology service provider with an aim to widen its footstep in fintech domain has aggregated various financial product offerings under the umbrella Cygnet Fintech. Its purpose is to empower financial institutions make informed decisions comprehensively and quickly with tech-enabled data driven platform.

With our global presence in tax ecosystem, we possess deep understanding of business operations and capabilities of meeting industry requirements. Correlating our expertise in justifying tax data with various business data like bank statements, ITR, financial statements, etc. we help in analyzing financial risks to a business and improvise credit decisioning. We are thriving businesses with adoption of new-age digital solutions to drive growth and digitally transform them for enhanced customer experience.
